mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, user_code, nick_name, password, status, factory_id, dept_id, telephone, mobile, email, create_user_id, create_time, modified_user_id, modified_time, is_delete, organization_id, remark
mapper.select:
select su.user_id, su.user_name, su.user_code, su.nick_name, su.password, su.status, su.factory_id,f.factory_name,su.dept_id, d.dept_name,su.telephone,su.mobile, su.email, su.create_user_id,u.user_name as createUserName,su.create_time, su.modified_user_id, s.user_name as modifiedUserName, su.modified_time, su.organization_id, su.remark, bo.organization_name from ocean.sys_user su left join ocean.sys_user u on su.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean.sys_user s on su.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes.smt_factory f on su.factory_id=f.factory_id left join fantech_imes.smt_dept d on su.dept_id=d.dept_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.base_organization bo ON su.organization_id = bo.organization_id
1=1
and date_format(su.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and su.user_code like CONCAT('%', #{userCode}, '%')
and su.nick_name like CONCAT('%', #{nickName}, '%')
AND su.user_id IN (SELECT sur.user_id FROM sys_user_role sur WHERE sur.role_id=#{roleId}) AND su.status=1
and su.status=#{status}
AND su.user_id NOT IN (SELECT sur.user_id FROM sys_user_role sur WHERE sur.role_id=#{roleId}) AND su.status=1

select sd.dept_id, sd.dept_code, sd.dept_name, sd.dept_desc, sd.factory_id,f.factory_name as factoryName, sd.status, sd.create_user_id,sd.create_time,sd.modified_user_id, sd.modified_time,sd.is_delete from fantech_imes.smt_dept sd left join fantech_imes.smt_factory f on sd.factory_id=f.factory_id where f.factory_name=#{factoryName} and sd.dept_name=#{deptName}
